name: RGB Genie
description:
Team size: 1

Role: Programmer, Designer

RGB Genie is a 2D platformer designed for mobile devices with touch screens. The player controls a ball that will be destroyed if it touches any object that does not share its color. Collecting a colored orb will change the ball to the color of the orb. There is a different path to completion for each color, and successfully reaching the end will award the player with the corresponding medal.
